title: Life After a Broken Engagement - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   Slice of Life   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Amnesia   Arranged Marriage   Broken Engagement   Death of Loved Ones   Dense Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Engagement   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Marriage   Naive Protagonist   Near-Death Experience   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Past Trauma   Possessive Characters   R-18   Royalty   Tragic Past   Unrequited Love
author: Mikadzuki Neko   朏猫
description:
The second prince got a woman with child and broke off the engagement he had with me. Ours wasn’t a love match to begin with, and I couldn’t even claim to feel angry or sad at the news. Despite that, it would seem I was still owed an apology. But why was one who brought it the older brother of my ex-fiance, the crown prince himself?

[Crown Prince x Son of a Poor Noble / BL / R18]>
